page.title: 12N WALSHAM BOWLS/SQUASH CLUB
page.content: Built in 1978 on land belonging to Tungate Farm, the club originally had 2 indoor bowling rinks and 2 squash courts. In 1980 this was doubled in size, and today the complex also houses a sauna, solarium, 3 tennis courts & an out-door bowling green. It also has a licensed bar & serves snack meals. There are 800 members of the bowls club, including 2 indoor & 2 outdoor internationals, and 400 members of the squash club, including the current English Ladies team coach, the number 3 British boy under 16, and number 2 girl under 14. The Bowls club enters 2 teams in the inter-county league, & the Squash Club 6 teams. In 1985 single membership to the Bowls Club is Â£16, & Â£35 to the Squash Club, with discounts available for Juniors & families.
